pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Ultimate Flora 60 Vegetarian Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Ultimate Flora

Warnings

WARNING: Seek medical advice if diarrhoea persists for more than: 6 hours in infants under 6 months, 12 hours in children under 3 years, 24 hours in children aged 3 to 6 years or 48 hours in adults and children over 6 years. Do not use if cap seal or if inner seal is missing, torn or broken. Contains sulfite

Common Uses

Ultimate Flora contains Saccharomyces cerevisiae (Boulardii), a probiotic yeast that survives stomach acid and colonizes the intestinal tract. Saccharomyces cerevisiae (Boulardii) supports gastrointestinal health and beneficial intestinal flora in adults. This species relieves diarrhoea in adults and children

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Each hard capsule contains: Saccharomyces cerevisiae (Boulardii) 250 mg (5 billion CFU)

Directions

RECOMMENDED DOSAGE: Take 1-3 hard capsules daily. Adults: To reduce diarrhoea take 3 hard capsules daily. To support mucous lining, take 2 hard capsules daily. Otherwise take 1 hard capsule daily. Children: Take 2 hard capsules daily to reduce diarrhoea. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
